Articles.Content:
I know he is still in grade school so he may not be home yet. Give him time

wait... are you talking about Zekes?... if so

He is rather late. He wold normally be on by now.......

Cmon Zekes

come on everyone. Are you too weak to accept my battle? tiny baby men!!
... I just don't have time or anything large/small enough

He is rather late. He wold normally be on by now.......

Cmon Zekes

come on everyone. Are you too weak to accept my battle? tiny baby men!!

Geez I just said yes,I Recommend starting out small 2-3 ships.(also how I'm still in design overdrive)

Edited October 28, 2013 by Spartwo
Ok. Can i attack you first though? Or do i set up first?
Both I have no idea what kind of ships to expect.
What i mean is who sets up the persistence first.
You set up.
But I did that with Zekes. Plus I need to go eat dinner soon so i wont have enough time to go build 2-3 nice armored crafts....

But I did that with Zekes. Plus I need to go eat dinner soon so i wont have enough time to go build 2-3 nice armored crafts....

Who said anything about armor or new craft.

The fact that my KSP broke last night and i only fixed it like a hour ago and i lost all my stuff.

Edit: Plus i got to go eat dinner and that would give you lots of time to do stuff since at my house dinner takes 4ever
Brain can i please battle you. Spartwo is offline and zekes never showed up. I already have a plane i just need something to blow up.

well the only land thing I have is this

the MML (mobile missile launcher) VV-1x

1-4 fires the missile groups

10 toggles larders and solar panes.

to fire first brake. then press g then ether space to fire all or 1-4

range is 14.7 km in"smart mode"( ie with sas on)

craft file: http://www./folder/ln9ang56crb0b/KSP?
Ok then. How must i destroy it?
I don't really care... use your imaganation

ok

btw your suppost to give me the persistence file not the craft. and il destroy it from a guided missle from the island runway.
just launch it and put it on the runway
Ok then. I shall

same here (10charsFTW)
